#summary Detecting stack-use-after-return bugs

= Introduction =

*Stack-use-after-return* bug appear when a stack object is used after
the function where this object is defined has exited.
Example (see also ExampleUseAfterReturn): 
{{{
int *ptr;
void FunctionThatEscapesLocalObject() {
  int local[100];
  ptr = &local[0];
}
// *ptr is used later
}}}
